message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this product to you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $1100000 is a good starting point, I'm looking to get the product for closer to $1000000.  Would you be willing to consider a price of $1050000?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product for 1075000. This is the best I can do, considering the value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $1075000 is getting closer, I'm still aiming for a price closer to my initial offer of $1050000.  Would you be willing to consider a price of $1062500?  This would split the difference between our last two offers.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm willing to consider your proposal, but I'm still not willing to go as low as 1062500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. I'm willing to sell the product for 1081250. This is the best I can do, considering the value of the product.
